name: Short Tailed Weasel
description: Small weasels also known as ermine.

name: Yellow-bellied Marmot
description: Rodents that hibernate for eight months and are seen climbing around rocks.

name: Red Fox
description: Smallest of the three canid species found in the park.

name: Bison
description: Yellowstone bison exhibit behavior like their ancient ancestors.

name: Elk
description: Elk are the most abundant large mammal found in Yellowstone.

name: Mountain Goat
description: Mountain goats are considered non-native species.

name: Bobcat
description: One of the elusive cats of yellowstone
